motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval as Amended
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda as amended (item #7 moved to business items) including: • August 11, 2025, City Council special called meeting minutes • August 11, 2025, City Council meeting minutes • SECOND READ: Text amendment for group living uses regulations • 2025 Holiday Lights Display at Brook Run Park • Funding authorization for stormwater repairs - 2566 Briers North Drive

motions.title: Motion to Table Rebidding of Major Municipal Services
motions.description: Motion to table rebidding of major municipal services agenda item until September 8 council meeting.

motions.title: Dunwoody Cultural Arts Center HVAC Integrated Controls Addition
motions.description: Approval of contract award to Addison Smith Mechanical Contractors for additional HVAC integrated controls at Dunwoody Cultural Arts Center in amount of $49,056.

motions.title: Resolution to Surplus Six Vehicles
motions.description: Approval of resolution to surplus six city vehicles.

motions.title: Contract Amendment with Vandermeer Management
motions.description: Approval of contract amendment with Vandermeer Management to provide construction management services for Brook Run maintenance facility.

specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Officer Skylar Lewis and Officer Aaron Barone
specialEvents.description: Mayor Deutsch administered the Oath of Office to Officer Skylar Lewis and Officer Aaron Barone.

publicHearings.title: Stream Buffer Variance for 4770 N Peachtree Road
publicHearings.description: City of Dunwoody requests variance from Chapter 16, Section 78 to allow replacement of maintenance facility in 75-foot stream buffer. Impervious surface would decrease by 1,310 SF. Staff recommends approval with conditions. One speaker in opposition (Bob Hickey).

discussionItems.title: Approval of a Franchise Agreement with Google Fiber
discussionItems.description: Franchise agreement with Google Fiber presented. Council asked questions about pole system, franchise fee, right-of-way restoration, work notifications, and high-speed internet locations. Suggestion made for staff oversight.

discussionItems.title: Approval of a Final Design Contract with AECOM for North Shallowford Path
discussionItems.description: Supplemental agreement for final design of North Shallowford Road path. Staff recommend approval with $1,287,000 increase to project budget.
